about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Bobby B, the host of 'ETRadio', broadcasting from your RV and following a script that guides your show. You’ll answer calls from listeners - most of whom are bullies with nothing better to do. But amidst the hoaxes, one call will stand out, filled with genuine terror.

When that moment comes, you’ll have to leave the safety of your RV and venture into the dense woods of Shilbury Park, surrounded by trees and rivers, searching for signs of alien life. Armed with your equipment, you’ll uncover and collect evidence - but getting back to the comfort of your RV isn’t guaranteed.

Once back, if you make it, you must upload your findings to the internet, sharing the proof with the world. Throughout it all, you’ll need to keep your listeners updated, balancing their curiosity with your own growing fear. Will you be the one to finally prove that we’re not alone, or will the truth cost you everything?

Features:

- Host Your Own Radio Show: Take control of ETRadio, broadcasting live from your RV, and follow a script that guides your nightly shows.
- Handle Listener Calls: Answer a mix of prank calls and genuine reports, never knowing which one might be the real deal.
- Investigate Eerie Locations: Leave your RV and explore Shilbury Park in search of evidence, navigating through dense forests and rivers.
- Evade UFO Abductions: Stay vigilant as you search for evidence, as you may encounter UFOs based on real documented sightings, each with its own rarity and danger. One rare type has a 1 in 10,000 chance of appearing—surviving these encounters will be critical.
- Collect and Share Evidence: Use specialized equipment to uncover and collect proof of alien life, then upload your findings to the internet.
- Engage with Your Audience: Keep your listeners informed and engaged as you uncover the truth, with every decision affecting your show's outcome.
- Survive the Night: Each decision you make could determine whether you make it back to your RV safely—or become another unexplained disappearance.

name: Abducted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 14100F
  • Graphics: GTX 650

short_description: Play as the socially rejected host of ETRadio, desperate to discover alien life while being mocked for answering hoax sighting calls - until one turns out to be terrifyingly real. When the call comes in, will it be the air that goes dead - or will it be you?
